type: Tutorial Step - Aim High, Trade Big!

definition.text: Picture an army of bots working with multiple exchanges, markets, and strategies, running on a network ala trading farm.

paragraphs.text: That is what the Network Node is about. What you've seen so far is running on your local machine. But...

Superalgos supports distributing tasks across networks of nodes running the Client to be processed in a coordinated fashion, enabling smart and scalable operations. Any machine running the GUI may control the enterprise!
You may set up a network with a few Raspberry Pi, an industrial-grade datacenter—or anything in between.
